title: Memorandum of Understanding between the Government of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka and the Government of the Republic of Maldives on Co-operation in the Field of Education
decision_details: -  the proposed Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) recognizes the importance of Education and Training in National Development as well as a means to further cultivate ties between their people.  The above proposal made by Hon. S.B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education, to sign the above MoU, was approved by the Cabinet.
